tasks.label: Update MapContainer dragging prop
args: $content = Get-Content -Raw 'app\components\AirspaceMap.tsx'; $updated = $content -replace '(scrollWheelZoom=\{true\}[\s\S]*?)dragging=\{true\}','$1dragging={false}'; if ($updated -ne $content) { Set-Content 'app\components\AirspaceMap.tsx' $updated }; Write-Host 'Ensured dragging={false} in MapContainer'
